description: This file provides utility functions for building SQL query fragments, including pagination and filters for transactions, used in the expense tracker backend.

methods.name: buildPagination({ limit = 50, offset = 0 })
methods.description: Returns SQL and parameters for limit/offset pagination in queries.

methods.name: buildTransactionFilters({ accountId, from, to, category })
methods.description: Creates SQL WHERE clause fragments and parameters for filtering transactions based on account ID, date range, and category.

methods.name: buildReportPagination(limit, offset)
methods.description: Provides pagination parameters with bounds checking, suitable for report generation.

ctags.name: buildTransactionFilters
ctags.pattern: /^export function buildTransactionFilters({ accountId, from, to, category }) {$/
